Commands.Darkness: 1-HIT AoE BRV attack that slightly consumes HP.
Commands.Valiant Blow: 3-HIT BRV attack that moderately consumes HP.  Initiates a Chase Sequence.
Commands.Danger Crush: 3-HIT Dark melee BRV attack  Moderately consumes HP after use  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Dark Cannon: 3-HIT BRV+HP attack.  BRV stolen from the target can overflow up to 200% of Max BRV.  After using Dark Cannon, Darkness and Valiant recover 1 use (up to the initial values).

Passives.Darkness Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after using Darkness.
Passives.Darkness Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Darkness.
Passives.Danger Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack when HP is under 20%.
Passives.Smash Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after initiating a Chase Sequence.
Passives.Valiant Blow Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Valiant Blow.
Passives.Darkness Charge: Increases the max uses of Darkness by 1.
Passives.Kill BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after killing an enemy.
Passives.Valiant Blow Charge: Increases the max uses of Valiant Blow by 1.
Passives.Baron's Red Wings: Prevents KO if HP is over 40% and leaves its value at 1.
Passives.Buff Boost&Speed: Moderately raises Max BRV and Speed while buffed
Passives.Darkness Extend: Darkness  use +2When using  Darkness :- Increase the number of BRV hits to 4- Tremendously raises its total BRV potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV- Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target- Slightly improves the effect of  Max BRV Up  and extends its duration by 4 turns- Grants  Power of Darkness  for 4 turns- Triggers a single target HP attack after useWhen HP is below 50%:- Turns  Darkness  to  Darkness+    Moderately raises total BRV potency  BRV stolen can overflow up to 180% Max BRV  Grants  Light within Darkness  for 4 turnsWhile  Power of Darkness  is active:- Turns  BRV Attack  to  BRV Attack+    Increase the number of BRV hits to 2  Greatly raises its total BRV potency- Turns  HP Attack  to  HP Attack+    Becomes a melee BRV+HP attack  BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV  Dispels  Light within Darkness  after use Power of Darkness  has the following effects:- Raises Max BRV and Attack- Lowers HP damage taken Light within Darkness  grants BRV regen
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and slightly raises Attack while buffed
Passives.Valiant Blow Extend: Valiant Blow  use +1When using  Valiant Blow :- Increase the number of BRV hits to 4- Tremendously raises its total BRV potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV- Slightly improves the effect of  Attack Up  and extends its duration by 3 turns- Grants  Power of Darkness  for 4 turns- Triggers a single target HP attack after use- Raises allies' BRV based on HP damage dealtWhen HP is below 50%:- Turns  Valiant Blow  to  Valiant Blow+    Greatly raises BRV potency  BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV  Slightly improves the BRV gain based on HP damage dealt  Grants  Light within Darkness  for 4 turnsWhile both  Power of Darkness  and  Light within Darkness  are active:- Turns  BRV Attack  and  BRV Attack+  to  BRV Attack++    Increases the number of BRV hits to 2  Greatly raises its total BRV potency  Slightly recovers HP based on BRV damage dealt for up to 5% Max HP- Turns  HP Attack  and  HP Attack+  to  HP Attack++    Becomes a melee BRV+HP Attack  BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV  Moderately recovers HP based on BRV damage dealt for up to 20% Max HP  Dispels  Light within Darkness
Passives.Radiance of Life and Destruction: Raises Max HP and Max BRV by 20%
Passives.Danger Crush Extend: When using  Danger Crush , adds or improves the following effect:- Slightly raises Attack for 2 turns

Weapons.Dark Claw CP: 35: Increases Valiant Blow's potency and lowers it Action Delay.Grants Small Attack Up for 5 turns.
Weapons.Waning Crescent CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Dark Cannon.
Weapons.Deathbringer CP: 15: Increases the potency of Darkness and grants Small Max BRV Up for 2 turns.
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Danger Crush  use +1When using  Danger Crush , adds or improves the following effect:- Slightly raises Attack for 2 turns
Weapons.Greatsword of a Flickering Dark Knight C: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Darkness  and  Valiant Blow
